headline: Ulta Beauty, UMG, Chipotle: Trending tickers
summary: Ulta Beauty (ULTA) shares gain after delivering a fourth quarter earning beat. Shares of Universal Music Group (UMG.AS) are falling after Bill Ackman announced Pershing Square will be reducing its stake in the music giant. Loop analysts upgrade Chipotle (CMG) to Buy and lifted their price target for the stock. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here

headline: Stocks rebound, Peloton jumps, Chipotle upgrade: Market Minute
summary: Hear what Wall Street is talking about in the latest Market Minute. All three of the major indexes (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are rising after a brutal day on Thursday.  Peloton (PTON) shares are jumping after Canaccord Genuity upgraded the stock to Buy. Chipotle (CMG) shares are also on the rise after Loop Capital raised its rating on the stock to Buy from Hold. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Chipotle Mexican Grill pullback presents 'attractive buying opportunity'
summary: Investing.com -- Loop Capital lifted its rating for Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE:CMG) to Buy from Hold on Friday, citing a recent pullback in its share price as creating an "attractive buying opportunity".
